name: room 104 (Season 1)
summary: Set in a single room of an average American hotel, telling a different story of the assorted guests who pass through.
info:
• 中文名: 104号房间 第一季
  • 制作: HBO
  • 集数: 12
  • 开始: 2017-7-28
  • 结束: 2017-10-13
  • 类型: 剧情、恐怖、悬疑
  • 国家/地区: 美国
  • 语言: 英语
  • 电视网: HBO
  • 官方网站: www.hbo.com/room-104
  • imdb_id: tt6064882

eps.name: Ralphie
eps.desc: Meg (Melonie Diaz) is hired by a man (Ross Partridge) to babysit his pre-teen son Ralph (Ethan Kent) for one night in Room 104. She is initially amused when Ralph warns her that "Ralphie", a bad boy, is locked in the bathroom. When Ralphie attacks Ralph and her, she fights Ralphie off and strangles him. Ralph's father comes back, and Meg is strangling Ralph. She realises that Ralphie was in her imagination.

eps.name: Pizza Boy
eps.desc: A pizza deliverer (Clark Duke) becomes involved in a couple's (James Van Der Beek and Davie-Blue) argument. It later is revealed that the 'couple' are actors and the events were an audition. The 'pizza boy' hires them.

eps.name: The Knockandoo
eps.desc: A spiritually-hungry woman (Sameerah Luqmaan-Harris) is visited by a cult priest (Orlando Jones). She remembers that when she was a child, a boy showed her his penis and she hit it with a rock. The priest puts a rod into her nose. Also starring Tony Todd and Jenny Leonhardt.

eps.name: I Knew You Weren't Dead
eps.desc: A visitor (Jay Duplass) seeks marital advice from an old friend (Will Tranfo and Frank Ashmore).

eps.name: The Internet
eps.desc: In 1997, a man (Karan Soni) desperately tries to teach his mother (Poorna Jagannathan–never seen on screen), over the phone, how to use his laptop to send a copy of the novel he has been writing.

eps.name: Voyeurs
eps.desc: An episode told without dialogue, but through interpretive dance. A maid and former call girl (Dendrie Taylor) reconnects with her younger self (Sarah Hay).

eps.name: The Missionaries
eps.desc: Two Mormons (Adam Foster and Nat Wolff) test their faith and their attraction to each other.

eps.name: Phoenix
eps.desc: In 1969, the sole survivor (Amy Landecker) of a plane crash contemplates whether to go back to her old life with her husband and children, or to start over. Also starring Mae Whitman.

eps.name: Boris
eps.desc: An aging alcoholic Croatian tennis player (Konstantin Lavysh) forms a bond with a housekeeper (Veronica Falcon) when he reveals memories of his tortured past growing up in war torn Croatia during the early 1990s while she in turn revels her status as an undocumented immigrant.

eps.name: Red Tent
eps.desc: A young man (Keir Gilchrist) planning to detonate an explosive at a political convention is interrupted by an air conditioning repairman (Hugo Armstrong) causing him to reconsider his plan.

eps.name: The Fight
eps.desc: Two female MMA fighters (Natalie Morgan and Keta Meggett) work together to earn a bigger payout for an upcoming match.

eps.name: My Love
eps.desc: An elderly couple (Philip Baker Hall and Ellen Geer) relive their first night together.
